backend/main.mo: Defines profile, attendance, homework, fee, and message types plus maps for storing histories and teacher/class assignments, along with authorization helpers and profile access utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature implementation evidence mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs for verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short predefined summaries for key frontend files including routing, hooks, pages, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with custom OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, authentication gating, and links to all role-based pages and dashboards.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout with header, footer, navigation buttons, logout handling, and optional notification panel.
frontend/src/components/NotificationPane: Slide‑in panel fetching and displaying messages with offline warning and close control.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity loading on mount.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profiles, attendance, and other backend interactions using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables, dark mode styles, and print rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ChairpersonLogin.tsx: Login page for chairperson role using Internet Identity and phone input.
Chairperson dashboard showing user stats and a table of all profiles.
Non‑teaching staff dashboard showing messages and online status alerts.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardStudentParen: Displays student dashboard showing attendance, homework, fees, and offline alerts using profile and query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardTeacher.tsx: Provides teacher dashboard with class info, attendance marking, and homework creation using related queries.
frontend/src/pages/PhoneOtpLogin.tsx: Handles phone-based login via Internet Identity, storing role and phone before redirecting.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Shows and updates user profile with editable fields, validation, and undo functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileCompletion.tsx: Collects initial profile details after login and saves them before routing to the proper dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelection.tsx: Lets users choose a role and navigates them to the login page with the selected role.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, container settings, and adding typography, container-queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the IEMS app’s goals, architecture notes, required images, and list of implemented features.
